page.title: 07LOCAL NEWS-LEASINGHAM DIST.
page.content: These are some samples from some of our{local newspapers}during the week from the 28th June to the 5th of July. A 32 year old fireman was in a {drowning accident}in Corfu with his wife and two children. The villagers in{Leadenham}look like they are going to win their fight for a{by_pass. There was tremendous response to the {Sleaford Festival of Sport}this year. Julie Wright, aged 8, found some 12 month old{kittens}at Roxholm which were{abandoned,}and close to death. A teenager named aged 19,was{fined {Â£500}after fighting broke out in the carpark of a public house . {Mr Ingleston from Leasingham won the {Round Lincolnshire Yacht Race,}using only seven minutes of engine power.
